message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. I understand its value to you stands at $12,000. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I would like to propose an offer of $11,000 for it. I hope this aligns with your expectations and we can move forward with the transaction.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $11,000 is a bit high for my budget. Would you consider $10,000?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and understanding of your budget constraints. After careful consideration, I am willing to reconsider my previous offer. For your convenience, I am now proposing a price of $10,500 for the product. This still reflects its value while accommodating your financial situation. I hope this proposal is more suitable and we can finalize the transaction.
I appreciate you working with me on the price, Alice.  How about we split the difference and settle at $10,250?
